newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Ericsson adds new radio base stations.
newsitem.headline: Ericsson adds new radio base stations.

text.p: Swedish telecoms group LM Ericsson on Tuesday said it had made additions to its RBS family of radio base stations.
These included the RBS 884 Macro High Power, the RBS 884 Macro Quad, the RBS 884 Micro Outdoor and RBS Pico.
Ericsson said the new base stations will boost the flexibility, coverage and capacity of analog and digital wireless networks.

"These latest additions will give Ericsson an extended range of base stations with varying power levels for differing applications in the 800 MHz and 1900 MHz bands at all levels in the network hierarchy," the company said in a statement.
The new base stations will be commercially available during 1997 and 1998.
